fields.name: General
fields.value:
• End your round when you get the hero shard.
• Do not start a round if you cannot complete it in the worst-case scenario (5100 gems for 9 flips).

fields.name: Best Strategy
fields.value:
• Have around 24 000 <:aowgem:847363788592119838> ready and do ~8 rounds (and get **1** extra shard). The average shard cost is 2390 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>
• Have around 62 000 <:aowgem:847363788592119838> ready and do ~22 rounds (and get **3** extra shards). The average shard cost is 2380 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>

fields.name: General
fields.value:
• With average luck, a player can get around 8 shards in 200 spins (4 from spins, and 4 from chests).
• The average cost for 200 spins is 19440 gems.
• The first spin is always free.
• On day 2~7 of the event, the first spin costs 60 gems __if you do not have any unused Raffle Ticket__.
• You can save unused Raffle Ticket for future Wheel events.

fields.name: Best Strategy
fields.value:
• Have around 19 440 <:aowgem:847363788592119838> ready and do 200 spins. The average shard cost is 2430 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>
• Have around 97 200 <:aowgem:847363788592119838> ready and do ~1000 spins. The average shard cost (after the first 200 spins) is 4860 <:aowgem:847363788592119838>
• If you aren't after the hero and just want Super Card Vouchers, have around 5000 <:aowgem:847363788592119838> ready and do 50 spins.
• Distribute your spins and make sure you use all Raffle Tickets each day so you can take advantage of discount the next day.

fields.name: Tips
fields.value:
• Focus on one hero. It usually takes about 6 month to level up a hero to level-15 through hero events.
• The best hero event is one that features the hero you want.
• Always assume that the hero you are leveling will be in events back-to-back. Many heroes have appeared in Card Master four or five times consecutively.
